section.title: Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.TextEditors.Models.Internals.ViewModelDisplayOptions Class Reference

listitem.para: TabIndex is used for the html attribute named: 'tabindex'.
Func< ITextEditorEditContext, TextEditorModelModifier, TextEditorViewModelModifier, CursorModifierBagTextEditor, KeymapArgs, TextEditorComponentData, Task >? AfterOnKeyDownAsync [get, set]
If left null, the default HandleAfterOnKeyDownAsync will be used.

Func< ITextEditorEditContext, TextEditorModelModifier, TextEditorViewModelModifier, CursorModifierBagTextEditor, KeymapArgs[], int, TextEditorComponentData, Task >? AfterOnKeyDownRangeAsync [get, set]
If left null, the default HandleAfterOnKeyDownRangeAsync will be used.
If set to null then no header will render.
HeaderButtonKinds contains the enum value that represents a button displayed in the optional component: TextEditorHeader.
If set to null then no footer will render.
If set to false: the Displays.Internals.GutterSection will NOT render. (i.e. line numbers will not render).

The integrated terminal logic needs a keymap, separate to that of the 'global' keymap used by other text editors. Therefore, this property is used to provide the Keymaps.Models.Terminals.TextEditorKeymapTerminal to the integrated terminal..

AfterOnKeyDownRangeAsync AfterOnKeyDownRangeAsyncLuthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.TextEditors.Models.Internals.ViewModelDisplayOptions Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.TextEditors.Models.Internals.ViewModelDisplayOptionsAfterOnKeyDownRangeAsync
Func< ITextEditorEditContext, TextEditorModelModifier, TextEditorViewModelModifier, CursorModifierBagTextEditor, KeymapArgs[], int, TextEditorComponentData, Task>? Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.TextEditors.Models.Internals.ViewModelDisplayOptions.AfterOnKeyDownRangeAsync[get], [set]
If left null, the default HandleAfterOnKeyDownRangeAsync will be used.
If a batch handling of KeyboardEventArgs is performed, then this method will be invoked as opposed to AfterOnKeyDownAsyncFactory, and a list of KeyboardEventArgs will be provided, sorted such that the first index represents the first event fired, and the last index represents the last event fired.

Keymap? Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.TextEditors.Models.Internals.ViewModelDisplayOptions.KeymapOverride[get], [set]
The integrated terminal logic needs a keymap, separate to that of the 'global' keymap used by other text editors. Therefore, this property is used to provide the Keymaps.Models.Terminals.TextEditorKeymapTerminal to the integrated terminal..
This property is not intended for use in any other scenario.
